Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content: The basic functionality of OpenCms is the core system. All additional features are packaged in modules. This provides the flexibility to adjust each OpenCms installation according to your needs and to easily move functionality or whole websites from one installation to another. In this background topic you learn about the typical structure of modules and get some guidelines on what to package as a module. The user interface for module management is discussed here.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: Package your resources - learn about the OpenCms module mechanism.

Link.LinkText: Managing modules via the modules app

LinkDescription.name: LinkDescription0
LinkDescription.content: Learn how to add, import, export, manipulate modules via the modules app.

LinkDescription.name: LinkDescription0
LinkDescription.content: Resource types are configured in modules. Since OpenCms 11, there's an own app to manage resource types.
